#summary Scheduled talks about Native Client
#labels Featured

To help the community learn more about Native Client,
we're scheduling a number of technical talks at major universities.
The first talks are in Europe:

  * 7 January 2009: Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Zürich (ETH Zürich)
  * 8 January 2009: Université Pierre & Marie Curie (Paris-VI)
  * 12 January 2009: University College London, UK

We also plan some talks in the US, though the details haven't been finalized:

  * 28 January 2009: MIT
  * 29 January 2009: Carnegie Mellon University
  * 30 January 2009: Harvard

We understand that many people interested in Native Client
don't live near a university we'll visit;
for you we will be posting a video on YouTube,
hopefully sometime in January.
We will send an announcement to
[http://groups.google.com/group/native-client-announce native-client-announce]
when the video becomes available.

More details on the presentations:
